name: September '06
description:
This is a REALLY EARLY DEVELOPMENT RPG Maker XP game.  It's supposed to be about those two persons on the "Cover" (Which I made quickly just to show someone a song I made for it, so don't take it as an official cover or anything) noticing it's too hot for it to be fall and decide to go try and find out what the cause is. Only one room is finished, and it's the starting one. And I may even change some things on there later on.

Also,, the game having female protagonists isn't really important. Just put the tag as I saw it and the game does have that lol
